argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | cpmadurid.a | |- A = ( N Mat R ) |
| 2 |  | cpmadurid.b | |- B = ( Base ` A ) |
| 3 |  | cpmadurid.c | |- C = ( N CharPlyMat R ) |
| 4 |  | cpmadurid.p | |- P = ( Poly1 ` R ) |
| 5 |  | cpmadurid.y | |- Y = ( N Mat P ) |
| 6 |  | cpmadurid.x | |- X = ( var1 ` R ) |
| 7 |  | cpmadurid.t | |- T = ( N matToPolyMat R ) |
| 8 |  | cpmadurid.s | |- .- = ( -g ` Y ) |
| 9 |  | cpmadurid.m1 | |- .x. = ( .s ` Y ) |
| 10 |  | cpmadurid.1 | |- .1. = ( 1r ` Y ) |
| 11 |  | cpmadurid.i | |- I = ( ( X .x. .1. ) .- ( T ` M ) ) |
| 12 |  | cpmadurid.j | |- J = ( N maAdju P ) |
| 13 |  | cpmadurid.m2 | |- .X. = ( .r ` Y ) |
| 14 |  | #P_crngring | |- ( R e. CRing -> R e. Ring ) |
| 15 | 1, 2, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 9, 10, 11 | #P_chmatcl | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring /\ M e. B ) -> I e. ( Base ` Y ) ) |
| 16 | 14, 15 | #P_syl3an2 | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. CRing /\ M e. B ) -> I e. ( Base ` Y ) ) |
| 17 | 4 | #P_ply1crng | |- ( R e. CRing -> P e. CRing ) |
| 18 | 17 | #P_3ad2ant2 | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. CRing /\ M e. B ) -> P e. CRing ) |
| 19 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` Y ) = ( Base ` Y ) |
| 20 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( N maDet P ) = ( N maDet P ) |
| 21 | 5, 19, 12, 20, 10, 13, 9 | #P_madurid | |- ( ( I e. ( Base ` Y ) /\ P e. CRing ) -> ( I .X. ( J ` I ) ) = ( ( ( N maDet P ) ` I ) .x. .1. ) ) |
| 22 | 16, 18, 21 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. CRing /\ M e. B ) -> ( I .X. ( J ` I ) ) = ( ( ( N maDet P ) ` I ) .x. .1. ) ) |
| 23 | 3, 1, 2, 4, 5, 20, 8, 6, 9, 7, 10 | #P_chpmatval | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. CRing /\ M e. B ) -> ( C ` M ) = ( ( N maDet P ) ` ( ( X .x. .1. ) .- ( T ` M ) ) ) ) |
| 24 | 11 | #P_a1i | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. CRing /\ M e. B ) -> I = ( ( X .x. .1. ) .- ( T ` M ) ) ) |
| 25 | 24 | #P_eqcomd | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. CRing /\ M e. B ) -> ( ( X .x. .1. ) .- ( T ` M ) ) = I ) |
| 26 | 25 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. CRing /\ M e. B ) -> ( ( N maDet P ) ` ( ( X .x. .1. ) .- ( T ` M ) ) ) = ( ( N maDet P ) ` I ) ) |
| 27 | 23, 26 | #P_eqtr2d | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. CRing /\ M e. B ) -> ( ( N maDet P ) ` I ) = ( C ` M ) ) |
| 28 | 27 | #P_oveq1d | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. CRing /\ M e. B ) -> ( ( ( N maDet P ) ` I ) .x. .1. ) = ( ( C ` M ) .x. .1. ) ) |
| 29 | 22, 28 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. CRing /\ M e. B ) -> ( I .X. ( J ` I ) ) = ( ( C ` M ) .x. .1. ) ) |
